María belongs to the “Corazón de Santa María” (St. Mary’s Heart), a newly-formed group that has six members.  They gave it this name because the zone they live in is called “Santa María.”

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Don Mario, como lo conocen sus vecinos es de la ciudad de Santaní, Soltero, tiene hijos que aun son pequeños y quienes son la razón de ser de Mario.
El es dueño de una pequeña pero surtida despensa, que es la única del barrio, y nos comenta que todos sus vecinos acuden siempre a su negocio para poder comprar de él, y gracias a eso le va muy bien y tiene los medios necesarios para poder mantener a su familia día a día. Su meta es seguir trabajando y de esa forma poder dar a sus hijos una buena educación y que no tengan que pasar por las privaciones como las que él tuvo que pasar.
Solicita el crédito ya que quiere surtir su negocio con bebidas, lácteos, comestibles, embutidos, carne, hortalizas, verduras y demás, con lo cual podrá seguir surtiendo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Don Mario, as he’s known by his neighbors in the city of Santaní, is single and has children who are still little and who are Mario’s reason to live.

He owns a small but well stocked store that’s the only one in the neighborhood.   He tells us that all of his neighbors come by all the time to buy from him and thanks to this he does very well and has the necessary resources to support his family day to day.  His goal is to stay in business to be able to give his children a good education so that they won’t have to suffer privations like he had to.

He requests the loan because he wants to stock the store with soft-drinks, dairy products, food items, cured meats, meat, greens, vegetables and others to continue stocking his customers.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Felecia

texts.en: Felecia is 34 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is single and has four children; three are in school and all live at home. For the past four years, she has been operating a small food center where she sells Liberian dishes. She has a lot of customers and she makes a lot of money, which is helping her to look after her children. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice, oil and other spices for her business. In the future, she plans to build her house.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil and other spices for her business.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El presente comité se formo mediante una de las integrantes quien había integrado parte de otro comité que se disolvió. Actualmente ella se mudo, e invito a sus vecinas y amigas a formar un nuevo grupo, de esa forma se creó el comité Las Emprendedoras.
La Sra Silvia tiene 32 años de edad está casada con el Sr Simón quien es Empleado, junto tienen 2 hijos. Ella es Comerciante, tiene una despensa, con la cual surte a sus vecinos del barrio. Nos comenta que empezó con un pequeño negocio y que poco a poco con mucho sacrificio fue creciendo hasta llegar a lo que es hoy.
Ella solicita el crédito para comprar, panificados, yerba, café, etc. para su negocio. Posee una meta ampliar su negocio y de esa forma seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
This committee was formed by one of the members who had been part of another committee that was dissolved.  When she moved, she invited her neighbors and friends to form a new group, and in this way, she created Las Emprenedoras Committee. 
 
Silvia is 32 years old and married to Simon who is a worker.  They have two children.  She is a merchant and has a pantry from which she provides food to her neighbors in the barrio.  She says that it began as a small business and gradually, with much sacrifice, grew to become what it is today.  

She is requesting the loan to purchase baked goods, yerba mate (a popular South American herb that is brewed into a high-caffeine infusion), coffee, and other items for her business.  Her goal is to expand her business and in this way, continue helping her family.

loans.use: to purchase baked goods, yerba mate, coffee, and other items.

loans.name: Virgen De Santa Ines Group

texts.es:
El comité  lleva por nombre “Virgen de Santa Ines”. Las integrantes agradecen la oportunidad que le brinda la Fundación  Paraguaya,  ya que así tendrán nuevas oportunidades  para emprender un mejor trabajo. Se encuentra en el Segundo Ciclo con 14 integrantes. Cada una con sus respectivas actividades productivas, son  unidas responsables y solidarias entre ellas.
Maria pertenece a este grupo y ella nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de frutas, ropas, y también productos Avon. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y no pierde su tiempo, es por ello que se dedica a varias cosas, con lo cual puede ayudar a su familia a cubrir el día a día.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de frutas, como ser bananas, naranjas, manzanas y demás, con lo cual podrá seguir vendiendo y teniendo buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This committee is called “Virgen de Santa Inés.”  The members are grateful for the opportunity Fundación Paraguaya is giving them since they will thus have new opportunities to start better work.  

They are in the second cycle with 14 members each with her respective productive activity.  They are united and mutually supportive.

María belongs to this group and she tells us that she sells fruit, clothes and also Avon products.  She is a very hardworking person who does not waste time which is why she does so many different things in order to help her family cover daily needs.

She asked for the loan to buy fruit like bananas, oranges, apples and others to continue selling and have a good variety available for her customers.

loans.use: to buy bananas, oranges, apples and more.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба не замужем, живет с родителями. Она помогает отцу развивать скот. Так как все братья женились и уехали из дому, ей  одной с отцом пришлось заниматься откормом скота. Ее отец также имеет 2 гектара земли , где они выращивают арахис. От продажи скота они смогут арендовать еще несколько гектаров земли и посадить бахчевые культуры, как арбуз и дыни. К Махбубе сватаются молодые люди, и ее родители хотят выдать ее замуж, так она планируют после развития бизнеса и полученной прибыли пополнить своё приданное как раз к своей свадьбе. Это ее первый кредит, который она получила для покупки коз и  хоть как то помочь своему  отцу.
texts.en: Mahbuba is not married and lives with her parents.  She helps her father to breed livestock.  Because all of her brothers got married and left home, she was the only one left to be involved in fattening up livestock with her father.  Her father also has two hectares of land, where they grow peanuts.  Sales of livestock would enable them to lease several more hectares and plant melon crops, such as watermelons and cantaloupe.  Because Mahbuba is being courted by young men, and her parents want to marry her off, she plans to develop the business and earn a profit, so that she can add to her dowry right in-time for her wedding.  This is her first loan, which she obtained to purchase goats and to somehow help her father.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for provisions

loans.name: Khurshed

texts.ru: Хуршед проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Хуршед музыкант. Он работает в филармонии. В этой области работает 8 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения музыкального (клавишный) инструмента.
texts.en: Khurshed lives in the city of Isfara.  He is 33 years old, married and has three children.  Khurshed is a musician.  He works at a philharmony.  He has been working in this field for eight years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase a musical instrument (keyboard).

loans.use: to purchase a musical instrument

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El comité Maria Auxiliadora es de la ciudad de Santaní, ellas son 10 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad que se han unido con el propósito de trabajar juntas y por medio de ese trabajo ayudarse las unas a las otras y salir adelante.
Matilde es la presidenta del grupo y nos comenta que ella trabaja siempre arduamente para poder ayudar a su familia y darles lo que necesitan para que no tengan que pasar por ningún tipo de privaciones como las que ella tuvo que pasar. Matilde tiene una carnicería y gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo está saliendo adelante.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cortes de carne, con lo que podrá abastecerse y de esa forma siempre tener este producto para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The “María Auxiliadora” committee is from the city of Santaní.  They are ten women who are friends and neighbors from this city who have joined together with the aim of working together and through this work help each other get ahead.

Matilde is group president and she comments that she’s always worked hard to be able to help her family and to give them everything they need so that they would not have to go through any of the privations she had to go through.  Matilde has a butcher shop and thanks to her work and effort it’s making progress.

She asks for the loan to buy cuts of meat to stock up on so that she will always have the product available to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy cuts of meat to sell.

loans.name: Muhtaram

texts.ru: Мухтарам замужняя женщина, она имеет 5 детей. У нее 4 дочерей и один сын.Дочки замужем а ее  единственный сын находиться с ней и помогает ей в бизнесе. Сын Мухтарам начинающий ювелир, он учиться у частного ювелира чтобы помочь матери в развитии бизнеса. Она раньше получала кредит для потребительских нужд, ремонта дома, проведения свадеб и на ремонт машины.Теперь она получает кредит для увеличение товарооборота, ее сын изготовил несколько ювелирных изделий, чтобы продолжит реализацию. Она рада, что  может получить финансовую поддержку от КИВА.
texts.en: Muhtaram is a married woman with five children.  She has four daughters and one son.  Her daughters are married, and her only son is with her and helps her with the business.  Muhtaram's son is beginner jeweler, who is studying with a private jeweler in order to help his mother with developing the business.  Muhtaram previously obtained loans for consumer needs, house repairs, holding weddings and car repairs.  Now, she is obtaining a loan to increase goods turnover, and her son made several jewelry items in order to continue sales.  She is glad that she can receive financial support from Kiva.

loans.use: to expand her business

loans.name: Imonali

texts.ru: Имонали мужчина 36 лет, женат, имеет 3 детей. Его основной работой является  откармливание скота. Но также у него есть земля, где он выращивает овощи. Каждый раз когда он покупает и  продает скот, на полученную прибыль он  приобретает семена овощей  и  сажает.  В этот раз у него есть заказ на саженцев огурцов и помидоров. Он планирует на полученный кредит купить еще теленка, а когда настанет время продавать , он продаст уже корову. Он живет с матерью и детьми, а его жена находиться в России на заработках. В их селе принято, чтобы младший сын жил с родителями, поэтому он начал постройку  дома, чтобы в будущем его сыновья не нуждались и были обеспечены домом.
texts.en: Imonali is a 36 year-old married man with three children.  His primary work is fattening up livestock.  He also has land, where he grows vegetables.  Every time he buys and sells livestock, he uses the resulting profit to buy vegetable seeds and plants them.  This time, he has an order for cucumber and tomato seedlings.  Imonali plans to use this loan to buy another calf, and when the time comes to sell, he would sell a cow.  He lives with his mother and children, and his wife is working in Russia.  It is customary in their village that the youngest son lives with his parents, and this is why he started to build a house to ensure that his sons would not be in need and be provided with a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase and resell livestock

loans.name: El Manantial Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama “El Manantial”  están en el  Décimo Segundo Ciclo, con 24 integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unidas, solidarias  y responsables las unas con las otras. Las mismas tienen un gran espíritu emprendedor, ya que realizan labores juntas para poder apoyarse.
Sonia es una de las miembros del grupo, y nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de perfumes de toda clase. Gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ha podido salir adelante e ir mejorando sus ingresos día a día. Comenta que le va muy bien ya que tiene muy buena clientela que siempre compra de ella los perfumes que vende, y gracias a esos ingresos puede ayudar a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de perfumes, tanto como para hombres como para mujeres, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando y ofreciendo mayor variedad a sus clientes. Sonia, como sus compañeras están agradecidas por la oportunidad de progreso que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The committee is called “El Manantial” (The Spring) and they are in their 12th cycle with 24 members.  It’s a group that stands out in the neighborhood because they are very united, mutually supportive and responsible with each other.  They have a great enterprising spirit since they carry out joint projects in order to support themselves.

Sonia is one of the members of the group and she comments that she sells all kinds of perfume.  Thanks to her effort and dedication she’s succeeded in getting ahead and gradually improve her income day to day.  She comments that she does very well because she has a very good clientele who always buys the perfume she sells and thanks to that income she’s able to help her family.

She requested the loan to buy perfume both for men and for women to continue working and offering a wider selection to her customers.  Sonia, like her fellow members, is grateful for the opportunity for success they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy perfume to sell.

loans.name: Ousseynou

texts.fr:
Monsieur  Ousseynou est un jeune chauffeur  de camion dans une entreprise de la place. En même temps il s’active dans l’élevage  de poulets de chair ou il a acquis une expérience de 7 ans. Ousseynou est  célibataire sans  enfants.
Il est à son second prêt à  l’IMCEC  et avec l’argent, qu’il demande, il va acheter  3 caisses de poussins, des vaccins et de l’aliment volaille.
Bien qu’étant  célibataire, cela ne l’empêche pas de participer à la dépense quotidienne de la famille.
Ousseynou tend à diversifier les produits et services et à améliorer les conditions alimentaires de la famille et cela avec l’appui des préteurs.
texts.en:
Mr. Ousseynou is a young truck driver working for a local business. At the same time, he raises broiler chickens, a line of work he has been doing for seven years. Ousseynou is single, without children.

He is on his second loan with IMCEC. With the funds requested he will buy three cases of chickens as well as chicken feed and vaccinations. Although he is single, he helps support his relatives. With the support of lenders, Ousseynou tries to diversify the products and services and improve the nutrition of his family.

loans.use: to buy chickens to raise and resell.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
This is 39-year-old Kadiatu, a married mother of two children aged 8 and 13. She has two additional dependents who live with her to assist a sister with her children's education. In 2004, Kadiatu established her house decoration business out of the need to improve her family's living conditions. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,500,000 every month.

Having already received and repaid three loans, Kadiatu is requesting a new one in the amount of Le 5,000,000 to buy additional picture frames, flowers, mats, carpets and rugs. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Kadiatu plans to establish an outlet in the township. Currently located in a stall, the business is slow when it rains. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for picture frames, flowers, mats, carpets and rugs.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
El señor Juan Pablo es separado su esposa lo dejo con su pequeña hija de tan solo 4 años juntos  vive en el barrio Guapuru 2 de la ciudad de Santa Cruz,  trabaja en su carpintería haciendo puertas y  marcos de ventana  y otros trabajos en general.
 El destino del  préstamo es para la compra de madera , ya que quiere aumentar su cantidad de madera para poder producir un poco más y  de esa manera mejorar la calidad de vida que llevan él y su pequeña hija, El señor Jun nos cuenta que trabaja todos los días en compañía  de su hija  en el taller de carpintería.
Este material que le hace falta  no la puede  comprar ya que sus ingresos son muy justos  para sus gastos  diarios y por este motivo el no dispone de dinero inmediato, pues se le presentó la oportunidad de comparar la madera al por mayor y a un precio muy bajo, esto le servirá mucho ya que tendrá material acumulado para trabajar.
 
 Entre sus sueños y metas, es ver a su hija en futuro con una carrera profesional para que de esta forma pueda tener un mejor nivel de vida, y ampliar su pequeña carpintería
texts.en:
Juan Pablo is separated.  His wife left him with his little daughter, only four years old.  They live together in the Guapuru 2 neighborhood in the city of Santa Cruz.  He works in his carpentry workshop making doors, window frames, and other jobs in general.

The purpose of the loan is to buy wood, because he wants to increase the quantity of wood to be able to produce a little more.  In this way he will improve the quality of life for himself and his young daughter.  Juan tells us that he works every day with his daughter in his carpentry workshop.

He cannot buy this material he needs because his income is just right for his daily expenses.  For this reason he does not have the money right now.  The opportunity came up to buy wood wholesale at a low price.  This will be a big help to him because he will have accumulated material for work.

Among his dreams and goals are seeing his daughter in the future with a professional career so she can have a better standard of living, and expanding his small carpentry workshop.

loans.use: to buy wood for his carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Las Milagrosas Group

texts.es:
Este Comité la milagrosa es de la ciudad de Villa Elisa, está integrado por 17 mujeres quienes son todas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad. Ellas han visto una gran oportunidad de progreso en el programa de la fundación, y es por ello que se han unido, para mejorar las condiciones de sus familias.
Andresa es una de las integrantes del grupo, y nos comenta que ella se dedica a la venta de carbón, con lo cual puede tener los medios para ayudar a su familia. Comenta que le va bien en las ventas, ya que el carbón últimamente es muy solicitado pues es más barato.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carbón, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y de esa forma tener más de este producto en su stock.
texts.en:
This committee (La Milagrosa) is from the town of Villa Elisa.  It has 17 members who are all women.  They are all friends and neighbors from the same town.  They have seen in Fundación Paraguaya's program a great opportunity to make progress and so they have come together in order to improve their families' well-being.

Andresa is one of the members of this group.  She tells us that her business is selling charcoal and it makes her the income she needs to help her family.  She says that her sales are going very well as charcoal is very much in demand lately because it is cheaper.

Andresa is requesting this loan to buy charcoal so that she can stock up.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.en:
This is 42-year-old Benjamin, a married father of four children aged 2, 5, 10 and 14 years. He has three additional dependents who live with him as he helps his sister with her children's education. In 2005, in order to become self-reliant, Benjamin established his patient drugs business. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,200,000 each month.

Having received and repaid two previous loans, Benjamin is requesting a new one in the amount of Le 3,000,000 to increase his stock, and hopes that it will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000. In the future, Benjamin plans to develop his shop from a patient store to a pharmacy and employ workers. The loan will be helpful to him and his family, and he thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase medicines.

loans.name: Kalbu

texts.ru:
Калбу 63 года, замужем, воспитала 4  детей. В качестве дохода для своей семьи, Калбу с 2010 года занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду и настойчивости,  в хозяйстве Калбу на сегодняшний  день имеется  7 дойных коров, 2 нетели, 4 лошади и 83 овцы.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Калбу обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп лошади и коровы с теленком.  Доходы от кредита Калбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Kalbu is 63 years old, married and raised four children.  She has been involved in animal husbandry since 2010 to provide a source of income for her family.  Thanks to her hard work and persistence, today Kalbu's business contains 7 dairy cows, 2 heifers, 4 horses and 83 sheep.  In order to further develop her business, Kalbu requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy a horse and a cow with a calf.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy various goods for resale.

loans.name: Elias Ramon

texts.es:
ELIAS RAMON, de 31 años de edad,  es soltero,   vive con el hermano, en el Recinto Rancho Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, no tiene hijos.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

ELIAS RAMON se dedica a la agricultura,a la siembra de maíz y cebada.Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, fertilizantes, abonos orgánicos, insumos, insecticidas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los abonos y mejorar los cultivos.

Las compras y ventas las ejecuta en  Ventanas de manera  semanal. El sueño es incrementar la producción  y poder seguir trabajando. Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  son las plagas que se presentan en los cultivos.

En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar, y visitar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Elias Ramón is 31 years old, single, and lives with his brother in Rancho Grande, in Ventanas canton.  He does not have any children.

The 'Bendición de Dios' (God's Blessing) community bank is located in Rancho Grande, in Puerto Pechiche parish, 45 minutes from the office.  It has 11 members.

Elias Ramón is a farmer who grows corn and barley.  He is requesting this loan to buy urea, fertilizers, organic manure, supplies and insecticides.  He will use the loan to buy fertilizers and improve his crops.

Elias Ramon makes his purchases and sales in Ventanas every week.  His dream is to increase his production and continue working.  the challenges he faces in his business are pests which appear on his crops.  In his free time, he enjoys relaxing and checking on his crops.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizers, organic manure, supplies and insecticides

loans.name: Cesar Enrique

texts.es:
CESAR ENRIQUE, tiene 53 años de edad, es casado, tiene 8 hijos de las edades de 28, 25,23,21,19,18,15 y de 3 años ,  vive con su esposa e hijos  en  el Recinto Rancho Grande, del cantón Ventanas, provincia de Los Ríos.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

CESAR ENRIQUE  se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de arroz y maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos, urea, insecticidas, lìquidos mata montes,  Con la ayuda del crédito podrá adquirir  los abonos necesarios para los cultivos.
 
Las compras las realiza de manera semanal en Ventanas y ventas de acuerdo a la cosecha en la misma ciudad.

El sueño es  prosperar   en sus tierras con incremento de productos. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta  es  la mala semilla que a veces les venden en ápoca de siembras.

En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar en su hamaca y visitar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Cesar Enrique is 53 years old, married, and has eight children who are 28, 25, 23, 21, 19, 18, 15 and 3 years old.  He lives with his wife and children in Rancho Grande, in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The 'Bendición de Dios' (God's Blessing) community bank is located in Rancho Grande, in Puerto Pechiche parish, 45 minutes from the office.  It has 11 members.

Cesar Enrique is a farmer who grows rice and corn.  He is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers, urea, insecticides and weed-killing liquids.  With the help of the loan he will be able to buy the fertilizers he needs for his crops.

Cesar Enrique makes his purchases every week in Ventanas and makes his sales according to his harvests in the same city.  His dream is to prosper in his business and increase his produce.  The challenge that he faces is bad seed that people sometimes sell during the sowing season.

In his free time, Cesar Enrique enjoys relaxing in his hammock and checking on his crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, urea, insecticides and weed-killing liquids

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru:
Гулсаре 45 лет, замужем, имеет 5 сыновей. Гулсара работает преподавателем истории в местной школе и в качестве дополнительного дохода занимается животноводством. Начав этот бизнес с суммы в 30,000 сом (KGS), благодаря упорному труду Гулсара смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме 13,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря прибыли от хозяйства, Гулсара оплачивает обучение своих детей в университете. Также Гулсара занимается изготовлением национальных изделий, таких как курак (одеяла, матрасы), сайма (вышивка), что служит дополнительным доходом для ее семьи. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулсара обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) для покупки дополнительных голов скота. Доходы от кредита Гулсара планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Gulsara is 45 years old, married and has five sons. She works as a history teacher at a local school and is involved in in animal husbandry to provide an additional source of income. She started this business with an amount of 30,000 som (KGS), and, thanks to her hard work and persistence, Gulsara was able to develop her business to have a monthly profit of 13,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to the business profits, she is able to pay for her children's education in a university.  Gulsara is also involved in making national goods, such as kurak (blankets, mattresses), sayma (embroidery), which serves as an additional source of income for her family.  In order to further develop her business, Gulsara requested a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of livestock. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mirian Jahaira

texts.es:
MIRIAN JAHAIRA, tiene 18 años de edad, de estado civil soltera,  vive con sus padres,  en  el Recinto Rancho Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, no tiene hijos.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

MIRIAN JAHAIRA  se dedica a la agricultura, siembra arroz y  maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar  fertilizantes, urea, lìquidos mata maleza, abono orgánico. 

Con la yuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes y el lìquidos que le ayudará de mucho para mantener sano los cultivos.

Las compras y ventas las realizan en  Ventanas de manera  semanal. Su  sueño es comprarse un terreno y culminar sus estudios.  Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  son las plagas que se presentan en los cultivos cómo el cogollero.
En su tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en:
Mirian Jahaira is 18 years old, single, and lives with her parents in Rancho Grande, in Ventanas canton.  She does not have any children.

The 'Bendición de Dios' (God's Blessing) community bank is located in Rancho Grande, in Puerto Pechiche parish, 45 minutes from the office.  It has 11 members.

Mirian Jahaira is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, urea, weed-killing liquids and organic manure.  With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy fertilizers and liquids which will help her a lot in keeping her crops healthy.

Mirian Jahaira makes her purchases and sales in Ventanas every week.  Her dream is to buy a plot of land and to finish her studies.  The challenge that she faces are the pests that appear on her crops such as the maize budworm.

In her free time, Mirian Jahaira enjoys watching television.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, urea, weed-killing liquids and organic manure

loans.name: Muna

texts.en: Muna is 38 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has six children between the ages of 11 and 28; all of them attend school. For the past 19 years she has been selling palm oil in the market, a business she started with money given to her by her husband. She is requesting a loan to purchase palm oil for her business. She plans to build a house and warehouse.

loans.use: to purchase palm oil for her business

loans.name: Matilde Florentino

texts.es:
Matilde Florentino es un ciudadano de 62 años de edad vive con su familia, en la comunidad de Canalette, en la región de Upala, San Carlos en la provincia de Alajuela. Esta provincia ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la producción de café y azúcar de caña. Produce además granos básicos (arroz, frijoles, maíz), frutas, legumbres, tubérculos y hortalizas, una de las principales zonas ganaderas del país especialmente a través de la producción del cantón de San Carlos. Además en la provincia se asientan las plantas procesadoras de leche de la Cooperativa de Productores de Leche Dos Pinos, propiedad de miles de productores de leche. Además en la zona alrededor de la ciudad de Alajuela se ha asentado gran cantidad de empresas manufactureras de exportación. En Alajuela operan las zonas francas de El Coyol, Saret, Montecillos y Bet. 

Don Matilde Florentino se dedica a trabajos de campo pero no le es suficiente para cumplir su sueño que es el de darle una vivienda digna a su familia, para ello necesita apoyo financiero para comprar los  materiales de construcción  y pagar la mano de obra .

Actualmente Matilde Florentino está solicitando un micro crédito de un millón cincuenta mil colones (¢1.050.000), con esto lograría darle una vivienda digna a su familia y de igual forma viviría más cómodamente. 
Matilde Florentino es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Canalette, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Con este préstamo él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Matilde Florentino is 62 years old and lives with his family in Canalette, located within the Upala, San Carlos region, in the Alajuela province.  This province produces the highest amounts of coffee and cane sugar in the country.  It also produces basic grains (rice, beans, corn), fruits, vegetables, tubers, and flowers.  It’s also one of the country’s main producers of livestock, especially within the San Carlos settlement.  Besides that, the “Cooperativa de Productores de Leche Dos Pinos” cooperative milk producing plants are located within the province.  The co-op is the property of thousands of milk producers.  Many export manufacturers have also located within the zone around the city of Alajuela.  The El Coyol, Saret, Montecillos, and Bet zones are also located around the city.

Matilde Florentino works in the fields, but it not enough so that he can achieve his dream of providing a dignified home for his family.  For this he needs financial support to buy building materials and pay for labor.

Matilde Florentino is asking for a micro loan of 1,050,000 colones ($2,100) so that he can provide a dignified home for his family and so that they will live more comfortably.

Matilde Florentino is a partner in the Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Canalette company, one of the more that 150 EDESA social organizations in Costa Rica.  He expects to be able to continue growing personally and financially with the help of this loan, and to be able to actively participate in the credit organization in his community.

loans.use: to buy building materials and pay for labor.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en: This is 44 year-old Hassan.  He is married, and has 2 children aged 20 and 14. In 1992, Hassan established his men's wear business. He began his business because he wants to reach the peak of his family needs. Working 7 days a week and 9 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,350,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Hassan has already received and successfully repaid 2 loans, and now requires a new loan in order to buy additional jeans shirts and polos. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Hassan plans to complete his building project and to own a shop.   He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for jeans, shirts and polos

loans.name: Marie

texts.en: This is 43 year-old Marie.  She is married, and has 3 children aged 10, 6 and 4. She has 5 additional dependents, who live with her because to help in their schooling and to also help in the business.  In 1991, Marie established her cooking condiment business. She began her business to help the husband to take care of the house and to meet her personal needs. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,700,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Marie has already received and successfully repaid 4 loans, and now requires a new loan in order to buy additional oil, rice seasoning, maggi, tomato paste and mayonnaise. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Marie plans to own a shop, build a house and educate her children.   She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for maggi, tomato paste, cooking oil, seasoning and mayonnaise

loans.name: Emma

texts.en: Emma is 28 years old and lives in Buchanan.  She is married and has 3 children between the ages of 3 and 9, all of whom live at home and two of them attend school.  For the past 6 years she has been selling fish in the local market, her main challenge is the raining season, but she makes a lot of money during the dry season.  She is requesting a loan to purchase fish (Bonnie fish, cassava fish) for her business. She plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fish (Bonnie fish, cassava fish) for her business

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en: This is 41 year-old Kadiatu.  She is married, and has 4 children aged 8, 6, 4 and 2 years. She has 5 additional dependents, who live with her to help in the business and to assist them in their learning.  In 1997, Kadiatu established her cooking condiment business. She began her business because she wants to be self reliant and to meet her personal needs. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,400,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Kadiatu has already received and successfully repaid 4 loans, and now requires a new loan in order to buy additional cooking oil, bags of rice seasoning, maggi, tomato paste and bags of onions. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 350,000. In the future, Kadiatu plans to increase her stock so she can have more customers, to increase her profit margin. With the loan she is assured to reach to a higher height. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for cooking oil, bags of rice, seasonings, maggi, tomato paste and bags of onions

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for men's jeans, polos and shirt

loans.name: Lourdes Rocio

texts.es:
LOURDES ROCIO, tiene 40 años de edad de estado civil unión libre, vive con  reside en el Recinto Rancho Grande, del cantón Ventanas, provincia de Los Ríos, tiene seis  hijos  y vive con ellos.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

LOURDES ROCIO  se dedica  a la agricultura, siembra maíz. Solicita el crédito para la compra de urea, fertilizantes, lìquidos para la maleza, insecticidas y así poder mejorar el cultivo. Las compras las realiza hace de forma semanal en Ventanas y las ventas al finalizar el ciclo de cultivo  en la misma ciudad.

Su sueño es  comprar un terreno propio  y así  cultivar los productos propios de la zona, los desafíos a los que se enfrenta  las plagas que afectan  a los cultivos.

Su tiempo libre lo dedica al arreglo de la casa.
texts.en:
Lourdes Rocío is 40 years old and lives in a common-law relationship.  She lives in the precinct of Rancho Grande in Ventanas canton, province of Los Ríos.  She has six children and lives with them.

Bendición de Dios Communal Bank is located in the Rancho Grande precinct of the parish of Puerto Pechiche, 45 minutes from our office, and is made up of 11 members.

Lourdes Rocío works in agriculture growing corn.  She is requesting the loan to buy urea, fertilizer, liquid herbicide for the pests, and insecticide to be able to improve the crop.  She makes her purchases weekly in Ventanas and sells in the same city when the growing season is over.

Her dream is to buy her own property to grow products native to the area.  The challenges she faces are the pests that affect the crops.

She spends her free time fixing up the house.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizer, liquid herbicide for pests, and insecticide.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
This is 38-year-old Daniel, a married father of two children aged six and four. He has two additional dependents who live with him to help his wife with the household chores and in the business. In 2002, Daniel established his cooking utensils business to generate income and to meet his family's needs. Working six days a week and nne hours a day, he earns about Le 1,500,000 every month.

Having already received and repaid three loans, Daniel is requesting a new one in the amount of Le 5,000,000 to buy additional dishes, bowls and cups. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Daniel plans to build another house with the profits arising from the loan and also establish an outlet for his wife to operate. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for bowls, dishes, and glass cups for his business.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en: Edith is 39 years old and lives in Buchanan, Liberia.  She is divorced and has 4 children between the ages of 14 and 19, all of them are in school and live at home.  For the past 15 years she has been selling used clothes, she started this business from her husband savings.  She likes her business because always keep her with money, and she is requesting a loan to purchase used clothes for her business.  She plans to expand her house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase used clothes for her business

loans.name: Holik

texts.ru: Холик  мужчина животновод, который уже четвёртый год кредитуется в организации и расширяет свой бизнес. Сам Холик работает наёмным водителем городского маршрутного такси.Он отец четверых детей, жена работает в сельской школе, учительницей.Их семейный доход еле хватает на ежемесячные расходы семьи, поэтому Холик дополнительно занимается откормом и продажей скота. В основном он разводит баранов, т.к. хорошо разбирается в породах мелко рогатого скота. На следующий кредит он планирует купить пять баранов и корм для них.
texts.en: Holik is a farmer, specializing in animal husbandry, who has been obtaining financing from our organization for the forth year now and expanding his business.  Holik works as a hired driver for the municipal shuttle taxi.  He is a father of four children, and his wife works as a teacher at the village school.  Their family income is barely enough to over their monthly expenses, and this is why Holik is also involved in fattening up and selling livestock.  He primarily breeds sheep because he is very familiar with small livestock breeds.  Holik plans to use his next loan to buy five sheep and livestock feed for them.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 30 years old and lives in Buchanan, she is married with 3 children between the ages of 1 and 16 that live at home, for the past 8 years she has been selling fish, she is requesting a loan to purchase more fish (cassava fish,Bonnie fish) for her business.  In the future, she plans to expand her business and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more fish (cassava fish,Bonnie fish) for her business

loans.name: Zoila Idalia

texts.es:
ZOILA IDALIA, de 57 años de edad,  vive en unión  libre,  tiene 5 hijos de 35,34, 30, 25 y 18  años de edad, vive con el esposo y con los hijos, en el Recinto Rancho Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

ZOILA IDALIA  se dedica a la agricultura, cultivo de maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, insecticidas, líquidos para la maleza y monte.

 Las compras y las ventas lo hacen en Ventanas de manera  semanal. El sueño es incrementar la producción  y poder seguir trabajando. Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  son las plagas que se presentan en los cultivos cómo el cogollero y el ratón.

En el tiempo libre le gusta arreglar su casa.
texts.en:
Zoila Idalia, 47, lives in a common-law relationship.  She has five children, ages 35, 34, 30, 25, and 18.  She lives with her husband and the children in the Rancho Grande precinct in Ventanas canton.

Bendición de Dios Communal Bank is located in the Rancho Grande precinct of the parish of Puerto Pechiche, 45 minutes from our office.  It is made up of 11 members.

Zoila Idalia works in agriculture growing corn.  She is requesting the loan to buy urea, insecticide, and herbicide for weeds and scrub.

She makes her purchases and sales weekly in Ventanas.  Her dream is to increase production and be able to continue working.  The challenges she faces are the pests that occur in the crops, such as budworms and rats.

In her free time she likes to fix up her house.

loans.use: to buy urea, insecticide, and herbicide for weeds and scrub.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
El comité San Francisco se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, como son las ventas y cría de animal. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
Cornelia forma parte del grupo, y ella nos cuenta que se dedica a la cría y venta de animales, como ser chanchos, gallinas, vacas y demás. Comenta que tiene varios clientes que compran de ella los animales que luego son vendidos para la faena. Este trabajo que hace es muy sacrificado, y requiere no solo esfuerzo físico sino también mental.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de balanceados para sus animales, ya que no quiere que les falte comida. Cornelia está muy agradecida por esta oportunidad de progreso que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
The "San Francisco" communal bank was formed by bringing together several neighbors in the city of Santaní. All the members of the group are self-employed, and carry out activities such as raising and selling of animals. The members created a very close-knit group, able to jointly undertake activities that strengthen their partnership.

Cornelia belongs to the group, and she tells us that she raises and sells animals such as pigs, chickens, cows, and others. She says she has several customers who buy animals from her, which are later sold for slaughter. The work she does is very hard, and requires not only physical, but also mental effort.  

She is applying for the loan in order to buy balanced feed for her animals, as she doesn't want them to lack food. Cornelia is very grateful to get this opportunity for progress.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: Memunatu

texts.en:
This is 32 year-old Memunatu. She is married and has one child aged six. In 1999, Memunatu established her textiles business. She began her business to generate income to meet her personal needs and to improve on the livelihood of her family. 

Working seven days a week and nine hours a day, she earns about 1,700,000 Leone (SLL) every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Memunatu requires a loan in order to buy additional lace material and wax cotton. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 300,000 SLL. In the future, Memunatu plans to get a big store and to have a wholesale business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for textiles

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
This is 43-year-old Mohamed. He is married and has three children aged 22, 18 and 12. He has two additional dependents, who live with him because they are aged. 

In 2005, Mohamed established his bakery business. He began his business because of the high profit earned in bread production. Working seven days a week and five hours a day, he earns about 1,150,000 Leone (SLL) every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL.

Mohamed has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now requires a new loan in order to buy wheat flour and additional diesel for machine use. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 300,000 SLL. In the future, Mohamed plans to open another bakery in the west part of the city. With the loan, he hopes to increase production of bread. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for wheat flour

loans.name: Katumu

texts.en:
This is 36-year-old Katumu. She is married, and has two children aged six and three. She has four additional dependents, who live with her to assist with the house chores and give them higher learning. 

In 2001, Katumu established her cooking condiment business. She began her business to take care of her home and personal needs. Working seven days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about 1,300,000 Leone (SLL) every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL. Katumu has already received and successfully repaid four loans, and now requires a new loan in order to buy additional cooking condiments. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 260,000 SLL. 

In the future, Katumu plans to own a shop and to be a supplier of cooking condiments and to educate her children to the university level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for cooking condiments

loans.name: Laban

texts.en:
Laban is an ICT specialist living in Mombasa, Kenya. Immediately after completing his college education, Laban opened a stall for mobile phone repairs and accessories, gained some capital then started the ICT business. He is married father of one child and has been running this business for eight years. He also owns a car hire.
Laban joined Milango after invitation from his friends in order to access credit. He is applying for a loan of 70,000 to purchase and supply computer parts to a company. 
Laban also intends to use the extra income from this loan to expand car hire business to a tour and travel industry despite the challenges of some customers not paying on time and high inflation.

loans.use: To  purchase and supply computer parts to a company.

loans.name: Dianah

texts.en:
Dianah is a poultry farmer who lives in the Coastal town of Mombasa, Kenya. She has been running the business for one year. She is a married mother of three children. She learnt of Milango from her friends.
Dianah began the business through loans from other organizations. She is applying for a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy more ducks, chicken and chicken feeds. The additional income from this loan will help her improve her business.
Her future ambition is to build rental houses.

loans.use: To buy more ducks, chicken and chicken feeds.

loans.name: Cosmus

texts.en:
Cosmus lives in the coastal town of Kongowea, Kenya. He is a grocery stall owner; the business has been operating for ten years. From this business, which Cosmus operates at the market, he basically sells vegetables.

He does not have any other business, and after being introduced to Milango by his friends, Cosmus is applying for a loan of 35,000 Kenya shillings to purchase additional stock of groceries and vegetables.

The challenge facing the business is drought, which affects the inflow of stock to his business. The extra income from this loan will help him pay for his children’s school fees in the future.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock of groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the rainy season.

loans.name: Cyprian

texts.en:
Cyprian is a resident of Likoni, Kenya. He is a farmer and has been in the business for thirty years. He was initially employed and after long term savings, he bought a parcel of land from where he carries out cereals farming, bee keeping and cattle rearing. He was introduced to Milango by his friends.
Cyprian is applying for a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to purchase seeds and fertilizers. He intends to save the additional income for future projects and his main ambition is to purchase a lorry for transporting the farm produce.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Badamtsetseg

texts.en: Badamtsetseg is a 38 year old woman who lives with her husband and 4 children in the capital city of Mongolia. She runs the business with her husband. Her 2 children study at the secondary school. She started the meat retailing business in 2006 and the business has been successful for those years. She purchases the supplies and delivers them to the regular customers and caterings. She trades around 70- 80 kilograms of meats a day. She has a further plan to extend the market. Badamtsetseg is a motivated woman who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the supplies in large quantities in wholesale so that I could save them and raise the income". The total amount she is requesting is 1,500,000 MNT to buy the meats.

loans.use: To buy the meats

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica, a 26-year-old married mother of three children aged three, five, and eight, runs a fishing business with her husband in Bien Unido, Bohol. Jessica, who does her best to improve their business and take care of their children, is requesting a loan to buy fishing materials including nets and an underwater breathing apparatus for her husband.

In the future, Jessica hopes for her children to finish college and find jobs.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and a breathing apparatus.

loans.name: Vergilia

texts.en:
Vergilia is a married woman with 2 children, ages 18 and 17. Her husband works as a driver.

Vergilia has been in the business of raising hogs for more than 6 years. She earns 6000 PHP per month raising and selling pigs. Vergilia works hard to sustain her children's education. She requested a loan to purchase pig feeds. Vergilia hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase pig feeds

loans.name: Vigilina

texts.en:
Vigilina does fishing for a living. Her husband, who is a fisherman, operates their fishing boat to catch fish. Vigilina sells fresh and dried fish at the market.

Vigilina works hard to help provide for their household needs and save for the education of her 7 children. Vigilina requested a loan to purchase a fishing boat engine, nylon, floaters and lead weights. She hopes for this loan to help grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing boat engine, nylon, floaters and lead weights

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.en:
Benedicta is a 41-year-old married woman with 4 children ages 3, 7, 16 and 17. Her husband works as a farmer.

Benedicta does farming for a living. She works with her husband in cultivating their land and planting rice crops. Benedicta also runs a small sari-sari store business. She is doing her best to provide for their household needs and send their children to school. She requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and seeds. Benedicta hopes that through their businesses, she and her husband would be able to sustain their children's education and provide a bright future for them.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Celsa

texts.en:
57-year-old Celsa is a married woman with 3 children ages 22, 21 and 18. She has been involved in farming for 30 years. Celsa primarily grows rice crops to sell. She earns 6000 PHP per month doing this farming.

Celsa has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and insecticides. Celsa hopes to earn better and be able to uplift her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Wellington Oswaldo

texts.es:
WELLINGTON OSWALDO, tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil casado, tiene 3 hijos de 17, 15 y 6 años de edad,  vive con su esposa y con los hijos  en  el Recinto Rancho Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

WELLINGTON OSWALDO se dedica a la agricultura, siembra  maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar  fertilizantes, abonos orgánicos, lìquidos para la maleza, urea, ranger y pago de jornales a los trabajadores. Con la yuda del crédito podrá comprar los insecticidas y pagar el diario a los trabajadores.

Las compras y ventas las ejecuta en  Ventanas de manera  semanal. El sueño es comprarse un terreno y poder variar los cultivos.  Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  son las plagas cómo el cogollero y el mal clima.

En su tiempo libre le gusta pescar.
texts.en:
Wellington Oswaldo is 40 years old and married.  He has three children, ages 17, 15, and 6.  He lives with his wife and the children in the Rancho Grande precinct of Ventanas Canton.

Bendición de Dios Communal Bank is located in the Rancho Grande precinct of the parish of Puerto Pechiche, 45 minutes from our office. It is made up of 11 members.

Wellington Oswaldo works in agriculture growing corn.  He is requesting the loan to buy fertilizer, organic manure, liquid herbicide for the weeds, urea, and Ranger-brand herbicide, and to pay the daily wages of the workers.  With the help of the loan he will be able to buy the insecticide and pay the daily wage to the workers.

He makes his purchases and sales weekly in Ventanas.  His dream is to buy himself a plot of land and be able to vary his crops.  The challenges he faces are the pests, such as the budworm, and the bad weather.

In his free time he likes to fish.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, organic manure, liquid herbicide for the weeds, urea, and Ranger herbicide, and to pay daily wages to the workers.

loans.name: Cesar Edwin

texts.es:
Cesar es un joven trabajador y entusiasta tiene 23 años de edad, vive junto a su pareja la cual lo apoya mucho; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido y la generosidad de su gente así como también por su agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva y esparrago. En su tiempo libre juega futbol con sus amigos y vecinos y aprovecha para poder comer uno de sus paltos favoritos, el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería Civil.

Con mucho entusiasmo y esfuerzo trabaja en su negocio de elaboración de ladrillos, se dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 8 horas diarias, es muy responsable y sobre todo a pesar de lo tedioso de su trabajo lo hace con gusto; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy conocido.

Cesar agradece mucho a los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar tierra para poder elaborar los ladrillos en crudo; lo que le permitirá tener producción y seguir trabajando día a  día para realizar su sueño:” Tener un Horno para el cocido de ladrillos y una camioneta”.
texts.en:
Cesar is a hard-working and enthusiastic young man of 23. He lives together with his partner, who helps him a lot. Their home is located in the city of Ica, a city known for its warm climate and the generosity of its people, as well as for its agriculture, especially the cultivation of cotton, grapes and asparagus. In his free time, Cesar plays soccer with his friends and neighbors, and he also takes advantage of opportunities to eat one of his favorite dishes, the delicious "Arroz con Pollo” [chicken and rice]. Because his parents had few economic resources, he was only able to study up to the fifth year of secondary school, but he would have liked to study Civil Engineering. 

With great enthusiasm and effort, he works in his business making bricks. He dedicates himself to his work about 8 hours per day. He is very responsible, and above all, he enjoys his work, in spite of the tedious aspects. He believes that his business is going well for him because it is very well-known. 

Cesar is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help provided to him, he will be able to buy clay to prepare the raw bricks. This will permit him to continue production and keep working day by day to achieve his dream: "having an oven to bake the bricks and a small truck."

loans.use: to buy clay to make bricks.

loans.name: Angel Vinicio

texts.es:
ANGEL VINICIO de 29 años de edad,  es soltero,   vive con sus padres  en el Recinto Rancho Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas,  no tiene hijos.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

 ANGEL VINICIO  se dedica a la agricultura, cultivo de maíz y arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, fertilizantes, insecticidas, abono orgánico así mejorar sus cultivos.

Las compras y ventas las ejecuta en  Ventanas de manera  semanal. El sueño es adquirir un terreno propio y una camioneta para transportar los productos.  

Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  son las plagas que se presentan en los cultivos como el ratón y la langosta, En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar, realizar trabajos extras en el campo.
texts.en:
Angel Vinicio is 29, single, and lives with his parents in Recinto Rancho Grande, which is part of Ventanas canton. He has no children.

The "Bendición de Dios" communal bank is located in Recinto Rancho Grande, in Puerto Pechiche parish, 45 minutes from the program office. It is made up of 11 members.

Angel Vincio is a farmer, and grows corn and rice. 

He is applying for the loan in order to buy urea, fertilizers, insecticides and manure to improve his crops.

He does his purchasing and sales in Ventanas on a weekly basis. His dream is to acquire his own piece of land, and a truck to transport his products.

The challenges he faces are pest infestations that affect the crops, such as mice and locusts. In his free time he likes to rest, and do extra work in the fields.

loans.use: To buy urea, fertilizers, insecticides and manure to improve his crops.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer muy luchadora, vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos cuyas edades comprenden veintidós y quince años; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por ciudad que se caracteriza por ser la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, asimismo tiene un clima cálido, hermosas playas y sus pobladores se caracteriza por tener una buena sazón para la preparación de cualquier platillo. Como buena peruana le gusta mucho la comida y uno de sus paltos favoritos es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pato”, asimismo en su tiempo le libre le gusta pasar el tiempo con su familia; con mucha dedicación ella estudio para ser Técnica en Servicio Fitosanitario.

Carmen trabaja en su negocio de crianza y venta de cerdos, ya sea la carne o también los vende vivos, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo ya que también trabaja en una agroindustria, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque cría a los cerdos en buenas condiciones tanto en la alimentación como la higiene por ello los clientes tienen seguridad y confianza al comprar su producto.

Carmen está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar cerdos hembra, lo que le permitirá tener cerdas madres y poder aumentar el número de cerditos, lo que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos y seguir trabajando para poder realizar su más grande sueño:” Tener una empresa más grande”.
texts.en:
Carmen is a very determined woman. She lives together with her husband and their two children, aged twenty-two and fifteen. Their home is located in the city of Chincha, a city known for being the cradle of the great glories of Peruvian sports. It also has a warm climate, beautiful beaches and people known for adding delicious seasoning to whatever dish they prepare. As a good Peruvian, Carmen enjoys food, and one of her favorite dishes is the delicious “Arroz con Pato” [duck with rice]. In her free time, she likes to spend time with her family. With great dedication she studied to become a Phytosanitary Service Technician. 

Carmen works at her business raising and selling pigs, selling them either as meat or alive. She has the support of her husband since he also works in an agricultural business. She believes that her business is going well for her because she raises the pigs under excellent conditions, both in food and hygiene, so that her customers have security and confidence when they buy her product. 

Carmen is very grateful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to the support provided to her, she will be able to buy sows, allowing her to have mother sows and to increase the number of piglets. This will permit her to increase her income and keeping working so that she can achieve her greatest dream: "having a larger business."

loans.use: to buy sows.

loans.name: Marlene Mercedes

texts.es:
MARLENE MERCEDES, de 33 años de edad,  vive en unión  libre,  tiene 3 hijos de las edades de 5, 1 y 3 meses de edad,   vive con el conviviente y los hijos, en el Recinto Rancho Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

MARLENE MERCEDES   se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva maíz y cacao. Solicita el crédito para comprar plantas de cacao, semillas de maíz, fertilizantes, urea, insecticidas,lìquidos para combatir las plagas.

Las compras y las ventas lo hacen en Ventanas de manera  semanal. El sueño es incrementar la producción  comprar un terreno. Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  son las plagas que se presentan en los cultivos cómo la langosta y el cogollero.

En el tiempo libre le gusta arreglar su casa y cuidar de su familia.
texts.en:
Marlene Mercedes, 33, lives in a common-law relationship.  She has three children, ages 5, 1, and 3 months.  She lives with her partner and the children in the Rancho Grande precinct of Ventanas Canton.

Bendición de Dios Communal Bank is located in the Rancho Grande precinct of the parish of Puerto Pechiche, 45 minutes from our office. It is made up of 11 members.

Marlene Mercedes works in agriculture.  She grows corn and cacao.  She is requesting the loan to buy cacao plants, corn seed, fertilizer, urea, insecticide, and liquid insecticide to fight the pests.

She makes her purchases and sales weekly in Ventanas.  Her dreams are to increase production and buy a plot of land.  The challenges she faces are the pests that occur in the crops, such as locusts and budworms.

In her free time she likes to fix up the house and take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants, corn seed, fertilizer, urea, insecticide, and liquid insecticide to fight pests.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco está iniciando nuevamente el cultivo de pipián y maíz para lo cual necesita los insumos como el abono, la semilla y los herbicidas, los cuales va a adquirir por medio del préstamo.
El obtuvo un resultado positivo con la aplicación del préstamo anterior que también fue utilizado para las siembras aumentándole la producción, este trabajo Francisco lo realiza con mucho entusiamo, pues logra mantener a su familia con la alimentacion necesaria.
texts.en:
Francisco is again starting the squash and corn crops.  For this he needs supplies such as fertilizer, seeds, and herbicide, which he will acquire with the loan.

He got a positive result with the previous loan, which he also used for the plantings, which increased his production.  Francisco does this work with a lot of enthusiasm because he manages to support his family with the necessary food.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, and herbicide.

loans.name: Glicela

texts.en:
Glicela is 38 years old and is a married woman with 4 children ages, 3, 5, 12 and 14. Her husband works as a farm laborer.

Glicela runs a small sari-sari store business where she sells canned goods, noodles, toiletries and other various items. She earns about 3000 PHP per month with her business. Glicela hopes to expand her store. She requested a loan to buy more items to sell such as canned goods, rtw clothes and softdrinks. Glicela hopes to have a successful business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as canned goods, ready to wear clothes and soft drinks

loans.name: Jenisa

texts.en:
Jenisa is 30 years old and is a married woman with 3 children. She has been selling fish for 2 years. Jenisa works with her husband in their business. They buy fresh fish from the fishermen in their town and goes around the community to sell fish. They use their motorcycle, which they built with a megaphone and ice boxes, to sell fresh fish.

Jenisa has requested a loan to buy weighing scale, ice boxes and more fish to sell. Jenisa hopes to invest in another business to help augment their family income.

loans.use: to buy a weighing scale, ice boxes and more fish to sell

loans.name: Emerita

texts.en:
Emerita is 44 years old with 6 children. She lives in Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga del Norte: Philippines. 

Emerita owns and operates a business venture, selling a variety of used cloths products to earn a living and she's been 4 years in this business. Each month, she earns 2,200.00 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 5,000.00 to purchase new items to expand product offering. 

This year, Emerita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Positively, she simply hopes for the business improvements.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offering

location.town: Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar los materiales con los que elabora su venta de tamales como maíz, frijoles, leña, aceite los cuales son necesarios para continuar realizando su negocio.
Ella considera que con el préstamo anterior a logrado estabilizarse y a apoyado a su hijo en lo que sea necesario, su experiencia con los prestamos ha sido favorable pues ya ha tenido varios y los ha administrado bien.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan to buy the materials with which she makes her tamales, such as corn, beans, firewood, and oil.  These are necessary to continue carrying out her business.

She considers that with the previous loan she managed to stabilize herself and helped her child in everything that was necessary.  Her experience with the loans has been favorable because she has had several, and she has managed them well.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, firewood, and oil.

loans.name: Kon Koun Doien Group

texts.fr:
Mme DJENEBA  est la responsable du groupe KON KOUN DOIEN. Elle est veuve  et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 27ans et le moins âgé a 22ans. 01 va à l’école. Elle a 03 personnes en charge.

Elle vend de l’igname depuis 2006(05ans). Elle s’approvisionne  à Léo au BURKINA. Ses clients sont  les  femmes et les restauratrices.

Elle veut  s’acheter  1 sac d’ignames.

 Elle épargne  ses bénéfices pour mieux s’occuper de sa famille. Elle ambitionne  devenir une grande commerçante pour acheter et revendre les ignames en grande quantité et aussi ajouter des pains de singe (tedo).
texts.en:
Ms. Djénéba is the group leader of the Kon Koun Doien group. She is a widow and the mother of two children. The oldest is 27 years old and the youngest is 22. One child attends school. She has three persons under her care.

She has been selling yams for the past five years (since 2006). She gets her supplies in Leo in Burkina Faso. Her customers are women and restaurant operators.

She wants to buy one bag of yams.

She puts her profits into savings to better care for her family. She aims to become a great retail merchant, buying and selling large quantities of yams and also the fruits of the baobab tree [“monkey bread”] (Tedo).

loans.use: to purchase a bag of yams.

loans.name: Jorge Roberto

texts.es:
JORGE ROBERTO, tiene 25 años de edad, de estado civil soltero,   vive con sus padres ,  en  el Recinto Rancho Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, no tiene hijos.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

JORGE ROBERTO   se dedica a la agricultura, siembra  maíz y arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar  fertilizantes y herbicidas, urea, abonos orgánicos y así mejorar sus cultivos.

Las compras y ventas las ejecuta en  Ventanas de manera  semanal. Su  sueño es comprarse una finca.  Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  son las plagas que se presentan en los cultivos cómo la langosta y el cogollero.

En su tiempo libre le gusta el deporte, jugar volley.
texts.en:
Jorge Roberto is 25 years old and single, and has no children.  He lives with his parents in the Rancho Grande precinct of Ventanas Canton.

Bendición de Dios Communal Bank is located in the Rancho Grande precinct of the parish of Puerto Pechiche, 45 minutes from our office. It is made up of 11 members.

Jorge Roberto works in agriculture growing corn and rice.  He is requesting the loan to buy fertilizer, herbicide, urea, and organic fertilizer.  In this way he will improve his crops.

He makes his purchases and sales weekly in Ventanas.  His dream is to buy himself a farm.  The challenges he faces are the pests the occur in the crops, such as locusts and budworms.

In his free time he likes sports, playing volleyball.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicide, urea, and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn is a married woman who has four children. She is 39 years old and resides at Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. 

Jonalyn owns and operates farm land, planting and harvesting rice for sale to earn a living. She has been in this business for ten years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase fertilizer and pay for the cost of farm maintenance. 

Jonalyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Jonalyn wants to make improvements to her house and improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay for the cost of farm maintenance.

location.town: Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Mernalyn

texts.en:
Mernalyn is a married woman who has eight children. She is 41 years old and resides at Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. 

Mernalyn manages a hog raising business. She has been in this business for five years. Each month, she gets PHP 3,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in the future. 

Recently, Mernalyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Mernalyn wants to make improvements to her house and improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

location.town: Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Editha requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business. She has been in this business for seventeen years.

In the future, Editha would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en: 69-year-old Lilia is a married woman with five adult children. Her husband is a fisherman. Lilia sells vegetables to her community. She also cooks viands that she sells during lunchtime. Lilia hopes to expand her stall and build a "sari-sari" (variety) store business. She requested a loan to buy more items to sell such as vegetables, canned goods, and toiletries. Lilia hopes for this loan to help grow her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as vegetables, canned goods, and toiletries

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 49 years old and married with five children.

Elena works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like snack foods, groceries, etc. to sell.

Elena has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from food vending.

Elena aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like snack foods, groceries, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en: This time, for her seventh cycle loan, Evangeline is borrowing PHP 22,000 to fund her hog-raising business. This business was previously funded through Kiva partner NWTF and continues to provide Evangeline and her family with income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicine, and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Isil

texts.en:
Isil works hard to support her family. She is married and has a home products retail business in the Philippines.

Isil requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more home products to sell to customers.

She has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Isil would like to save enough to put up another business.

loans.use: to buy more home products to sell to customers.

loans.name: Oscar Omar

texts.es:
OSCAR OMAR de 35 años de edad, de estado civil soltero,   vive con los hijos  en el Recinto Rancho Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas,  tiene hijos de 14, 6 y 2 años de edad.

La VRC  Bendición de Dios se   encuentra ubicada en el Recinto  Rancho Grande de la parroquia Puerto Pechiche a  45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

 OSCAR OMAR se dedica a la agricultura, cultivo de maíz.Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, abono orgánico, insecticidas y así mejorar los cultivos.Las compras y ventas las ejecuta en  Ventanas de manera  semanal.

Su  sueño es adquirir un terreno propio. Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  son las plagas que se presentan en los cultivos. (langosta).  En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar, y disfrutar momentos agradables con los hijos.
texts.en:
Oscar Omar is 35, single, and lives with his children in Recinto Rancho Grande, which is part of Ventanas canton. He has children ages 14, 6 and 2.

The "Bendición de Dios" communal bank is located in Recinto Rancho Grande, in Puerto Pechiche parish, 45 minutes from the program office. It is made up of 11 members.

Oscar Omar is a farmer, and grows corn. He is applying for the loan in order to buy urea, manure, and insecticides to improve his crops. He does his purchasing and sales in Ventanas on a weekly basis. His dream is to acquire his own piece of land. The challenges he faces are pest infestations that affect the crops, such as locusts.

In his free time he likes to rest, and enjoy pleasant times with his children.

loans.use: To buy urea, manure and insecticides to improve his crops.

loans.name: Celina Del Sagrario

texts.es:
Celina desea invertir más en el negocio ya que su clientela a mejorado pretende aumentar la mercadería para tener más ventas a través de este nuevo préstamo comprara juguetes, peluches, calcomanías, accesorios para celulares, entre otros productos que son demandados por sus clientes.
Ella considera que con el préstamo anterior realizo una buena inversión, que le ayudo a mejorar el inventario de productos contando con esta fuente de ingreso para proveer a su familia lo necesario.
texts.en:
Celina wishes to invest more in the business because her customer numbers have risen.  Through this new loan, she intends to increase merchandise selection in order to have more sales. She will purchase toys, teddy bears, decals, cellular phone accessories, and other products that are in customer demand.

She believes that she made a good investment with the previous loan and that it helped her to increase inventory.  She relies on this source of income to provide for her family’s needs.

loans.use: to purchase toys, teddy bears, and decals

loans.name: Josiecora

texts.en: This time, for her sixth cycle loan, Josiecora is borrowing PHP 15,000 to fund her beauty parlor business. This business was previously funded through NWTF, and Kiva continues to enable Josiecora and her family to increase their income and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy beauty supplies for her beauty salon business.

loans.name: Wilson Arnulfo

texts.es:
WILSON ARNULFO tiene 35 años de edad es casado tiene tres hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 10, 8 y 4 años de edad en Chimbo provincia de bolívar.

WILSON ARNULFO es Policia Nacional. Solicita el crédito para comprar medicina para el hijo mayor. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar la medicación que necesita con urgencia.
